A '''Dragon Egg''' is a type of Pokémon Egg that can hatch Dragon-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn !! Sinnoh |- | Dratini || | || Bagon || Gible |- | Dragonair || | || Shelgon || Gabite |- | Dragonite || | || Salamence || Garchomp |} ===Acquisition=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location !! Price |- | Fuchsia City || | 1000 [[Quest Points]] |- | Ever Grande City || | 1000 [[Quest Points ]] |} {{Eggs}}
